title: Santos-Silva signs with Cleveland Browns - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: Santos-Silva signs with Cleveland Browns - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: Former Texas Tech basketball player Marcus Santos-Silva has signed a free agent deal with the Cleveland Browns. Santos-Silva earned All-Big 12 Honorable Mention last season where he averaged 4.7 points, 4.1 rebounds and led the Red Raiders with 25 blocked shots.
